metadata.title: CVE-2024-43907 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu/pm: Fix the null pointer dereference in apply_state_adjust_rulesCheck the pointer value to fix potential null pointerdereference

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
